body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging         The park once had a lodge but it was closed in the late 1980's. NPS photo  There is no lodging within Bandelier, but there is a wide variety available in nearby communities including Los Alamos, White Rock, Espanola, and Santa Fe. To contact the Chambers of Commerce for these communities, call: Los Alamos/White Rock: (505) 662-8105 Espanola: (505) 753-2831 Santa Fe: (505) 983-7317
